name: Suspicious Mixed Yakisoba
desc: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. Both the noodles and the side dishes show signs of having been burned black, testament to the tragedy that must have befallen earlier.

customize.name: Recipe: Mixed Yakisoba
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Mixed Yakisoba.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Cabbage
customize.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Mixed Yakisoba
customize.desc: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. One merely needs to stir-fry the noodles and side dishes evenly before serving, making this an easy-to-make and filling dish. It is no wonder, then, that this dish is so sought after among Inazumans.

customize.name: Delicious Mixed Yakisoba
customize.desc: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. Some mysterious art of seasoning has been imparted upon the slightly curled noodles and ordinary side dishes. Smooth, springy, rich... the magic at work on the plate is such that one will never tire of cleaning it out.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.
